title: Spurs Psychologist Sues Joshua Primo, Saying He Exposed Himself to Her
description: A sports psychologist for the San Antonio Spurs sued Joshua Primo and the team, saying the Spurs did not protect her after she complained to senior executives.
dc:creator: Jenny Vrentas and Sopan Deb
media:description: The Spurs selected Joshua Primo with the No. 12 pick in the 2021 draft but suddenly waived him Friday.
